{"id":1150563598,"question_id":29,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1705655737,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1150563598/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Two Integers","memory":"40.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int divide(int dividend, int divisor) {\n        // use bit manipulation to replace mul\n\n        long a = dividend;\n        long b = divisor;\n\n        boolean sign = (a>0==b>0) ? false : true;\n\n        a = Math.abs(a);\n        b = Math.abs(b);\n\n        long quotient = 0;\n\n        while(a>=b){\n            long c=b;\n            long cnt=1;\n            while((c<<1)<=a){\n                c<<=1;\n                cnt<<=1;\n            }\n            a-=c;\n            quotient+=cnt;\n\n        }\n        \n        if(sign) return (int)-quotient;\n\n        if(quotient >= Integer.MAX_VALUE)\n            return Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n\n        \n\n        return  (int)quotient;\n\n        /*\n\n        a/b = ? => a= b*2\n\n        b*2\n        b*4\n        b*8\n        b*16\n        ...\n\n        */\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-two-integers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
